General.Name: Meltwater Bv
General.Description: Meltwater N.V., together with its subsidiaries, provides cloud-based news, social media monitoring, and related services in the United States, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, India, the Asia Pacific, Canada, and the rest of the Americas. It offers media intelligence, media relations, social listening and analytics, social media management, consumer intelligence, influencer marketing, sales intelligence, and API and data integration solutions. Meltwater N.V. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 465 California Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
